page.title: 12Occupational Gazetteer
page.content: This list constitutes the principal occupations of the residents.Most people nowadays commute to work sometimes as far away as 50 miles. Adult literacy worker: Armed Forces: Artist: Builder: Bus Driver: Car Salesman: Chartered Surveyor: Chauffeur: Dairyman: Electrician: Engineer: Farmer: Farm labourer: Garage mechanic: Glaxo Operatives: Horse Breeder: Hotel Worker: Innkeeper: Joiner: Leather Cutter: Lengthsman: Lorry Driver: Nurse: Photographer: Poultryman: Printer: Quarryman: Road Mender: Sales Engineer : Stone Waller: Security Man: Sub Post Mistress: Student: Scrap Metal Merchant: Shopkeeper: Sign Maker: Teacher: Telephone Engineer: Violin Teacher: Less than 5 people are unemployed.Among retired people are a gamekeeper,railwayman and a director.
